data.name: Scarlet Witch
data.description: A mystical controller that prolongs negative effects and redistributes health across her teammates.

starItems.name: Scarlet Witch
starItems.description: A mystical controller that prolongs negative effects and redistributes health across her teammates.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing damage + apply <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect.

If this character is not at full energy, this attack does <color=#86e619>50%</color> more damage.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing damage + apply <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect.

If this character is not at full energy, this attack does <color=#86e619>50%</color> more damage.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing damage + apply <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect.

If this character is not at full energy, this attack does <color=#86e619>50%</color> more damage.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing damage + apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects.

If this character is not at full energy, this attack does <color=#86e619>50%</color> more damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing
If this character is not at full energy, apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns instead

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing damage + apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects.

If this character is not at full energy, this attack does <color=#86e619>50%</color> more damage and apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns instead.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> Piercing damage + apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects.

If this character is not at full energy, this attack does <color=#86e619>50%</color> more damage and apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns instead.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing
If this character is not at full energy, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns instead

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing damage + apply <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects.

If this character is not at full energy, this attack does <color=#86e619>50%</color> more damage and apply <color=#fff568>Offense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, and <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns instead.

1.description: Redistribute your total squad health evenly. Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to Vision if he is an ally.
1.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies, plus Vision if he is an ally

2.description: Redistribute your total squad health evenly. Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random allies, plus Vision if he is an ally.
2.nextUpgrade:
Heal self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health
Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to all allies

3.description:
Heal self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Redistribute your total squad health evenly. Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to all allies.
3.nextUpgrade: <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally, plus always apply to Vision if he is an ally

4.description:
Heal self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Redistribute your total squad health evenly. Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to all allies. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random ally, plus always apply to Vision if he is an ally.
4.nextUpgrade: <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> random allies, plus always apply to Vision if he is an ally

5.description:
Heal self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Redistribute your total squad health evenly. Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to all allies. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> allies, plus always apply to Vision if he is an ally.
5.nextUpgrade: <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to each ally, plus always apply to Vision if he is an ally

6.description:
Heal self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally for <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Redistribute your total squad health evenly. Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to all allies. <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to each ally, plus always apply to Vision if he is an ally.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Healing
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to all allies

7.description:
Heal self and <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally for <color=#86e619>100%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Redistribute your total squad health evenly.
Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to all allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to all allies.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies. If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack deals double damage to all enemies.
Prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target.

This attack is Unavoidable.
If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: Prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects on each target

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies. If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack deals double damage to all enemies.
Prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target.

This attack is Unavoidable.
If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked.

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies. If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack deals double damage to all enemies.
Prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>2</color> random negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target.

This attack is Unavoidable.
If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade: Prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects on each target

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies. If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack deals double damage to all enemies.
Prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target.

This attack is Unavoidable.
If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>135%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies. If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack deals double damage to all enemies.
Prolong the duration of <color=#86e619>3</color> random negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target.

This attack is Unavoidable.
If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade: Prolong the duration of all negative effects on each target

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>135%</color> Piercing + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies. If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack deals double damage to all enemies.
Prolong the duration of all negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target.

This attack is Unavoidable.
If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked.

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to all enemies. If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack deals double damage to all enemies.
Prolong the duration of all negative effects by <color=#86e619>1</color> on each target.

This attack is Unavoidable.
If Quicksilver is an ally, this attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Spawn, if Quicksilver is an ally, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally.

On Turn, <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to spread a negative effect from an enemy with a negative effect to an adjacent target. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

On Attacked, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
When an enemy attacks a Quicksilver ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage.

On Death, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, and <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally.
On Quicksilver ally Death, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, and <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to spread a negative effect
When Quicksilver attacked, +<color=#86e619>75%</color> damage to that enemy

2.description:
On Spawn, if Quicksilver is an ally, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally.

On Turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to spread a negative effect from an enemy with a negative effect to an adjacent target. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

On Attacked, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
When an enemy attacks a Quicksilver ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage.

On Death, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, and <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally.
On Quicksilver ally Death, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, and <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to spread a negative effect
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> when attacked

3.description:
On Spawn, if Quicksilver is an ally, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally.

On Turn, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to spread a negative effect from an enemy with a negative effect to an adjacent target. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

On Attacked, <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
When an enemy attacks a Quicksilver ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage.

On Death, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, and <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally.
On Quicksilver ally Death, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, and <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to spread a negative effect
When Quicksilver attacked, +<color=#86e619>125%</color> damage to that enemy

4.description:
On Spawn, if Quicksilver is an ally, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally.

On Turn, <color=#86e619>40%</color> chance to spread a negative effect from an enemy with a negative effect to an adjacent target. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

On Attacked, <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
When an enemy attacks a Quicksilver ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

On Death, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, and <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally.
On Quicksilver ally Death, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, and <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to spread a negative effect
Always gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> when attacked

5.description:
On Spawn, if Quicksilver is an ally, apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally.

On Turn, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to spread a negative effect from an enemy with a negative effect to an adjacent target. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

On Attacked, gain <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.
When an enemy attacks a Quicksilver ally, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

On Death, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, and <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Quicksilver ally.
On Quicksilver ally Death, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Counter</color>, and <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
